name: Span (youli21)
description:
Span is a hand-drawn puzzle game

Span enables the players to explore and reconfigure the concept of space in imaginative ways to solve puzzles. It introduces an experience of perceiving 2D space in a 3D perspective, and makes possible unprecedented ways of communication on different planes.

Tracing the process to repair a mask across different space and time, Span tells the story both about tracing the original roots and giving them life in the present.

Gameplay Instruction
